name: CrowdFlower client
body:
### Crowdsourcing services
According to Wikipedia crowdsourcing is outsourcing some tasks to the crowds - a bunch of people living and working in different parts of the world. There are currently two major players in the field of crowdsourcing services: one is [Amazon Mechanical Turk](https://www.mturk.com/mturk/welcome) and the other one is [CrowdFlower](https://crowdflower.com/).

CrowdFlowerClient is a simple client in Java using CrowdFlower RESTful web service API. With it you can:
* create new job without data
* create new job by uploading data in JSON or CSV
* upload data to existing job

It is used in one of my other projects -- an extension for OpenRefine (@OpenRefine) (previously known as Google Refine). Check out other projects at my profile page (see @sparkica).
tagline: A simple client for Crowdflower crowdsourcing service
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
